DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , Phase IIIb , randomize , double-blind , active-controlled , parallel-group , comparative study . The objective study : 1 . To compare efficacy tiotropium 18 mcg daily plus Formoterol Fumarate Inhalation Solution ( FFIS ) 20 mcg twice daily tiotropium 18 mcg daily . 2 . To obtain safety data use tiotropium 18 mcg daily plus FFIS 20 mcg twice daily compare tiotropium 18 mcg daily .
DOC.brief_title: Study Subjects Greater Than 40 Years Age With COPD
DOC.criteria: Medical diagnosis COPD Current prior history cigarette smoke Medical diagnosis asthma Significant condition disease COPD
